CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Eddiehaven Panthers?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Eddiehaven Panthers is arc {New Chiefs}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Poolechester Dynasty?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Poolechester Dynasty is arc {South Stars}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {New Chiefs} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Eddiehaven Panthers} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Cherylberg Sharks and Poolechester Dynasty in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Cherylberg Sharks and Poolechester Dynasty is {201}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between South Stars and Poolechester Dynasty in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between South Stars and Poolechester Dynasty is {256}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Cherylberg Sharks?
SC.A: The total flow output from Cherylberg Sharks is {620}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Eddiehaven Panthers?
SC.A: The total flow input by Eddiehaven Panthers is {905}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 434? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {528} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {New Chiefs}, a flow of {529} from {New Chiefs} to {Eddiehaven Panthers}, a flow of {452} from {Cherylberg Sharks} to {South Stars}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 274? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {256} from {South Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {201} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {Cherylberg Sharks}, a flow of {168} from {Cherylberg Sharks} to {Poolechester Dynasty}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 274 and 396? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {376} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {Eddiehaven Panthers}, a flow of {338} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {292} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {South Stars}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Cherylberg Sharks to Poolechester Dynasty or from Poolechester Dynasty to Eddiehaven Panthers?
NC.A: The flow from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {Eddiehaven Panthers} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from South Stars to Poolechester Dynasty, from South Stars to Cherylberg Sharks, or from Eddiehaven Panthers to New Chiefs?
NC.A: The flow from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {New Chiefs} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Poolechester Dynasty}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Eddiehaven Panthers} and {New Chiefs}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Cherylberg Sharks, Arc South Stars, Arc Poolechester Dynasty, Arc Eddiehaven Panthers, Arc New Chiefs}.
